definition[0]: a way of checking the quality of MASS-PRODUCED goods, in which a small number of the finished items are examined, and the standard of this sample is used as a guide to the quality of the rest
example[0]: Inspection is undertaken primarily by process control and acceptance sampling.
definition[1]: when a small number of documents, records etc are checked to see if they are correct, and the standard of this sample is used as a guide to whether the rest are correct
